name: BASIC RACING SIM
description:
YOU CAN USE A CONTROLLER 

-This isn't meant to be good. It is meant to show people how a basic race can be made.

-The code can show how basic movement is made, collision with walls works, check point to count laps, and cloud high score.

-Everything is originally mine except for the name save data. That credit goes to Parsec Games

Just so you know i created this with the coding engine Scratch
